title: Group portrait of Hill City Youth Municipality Band, including Malcolm Hill with drum on left, Roland Saunders with trumpet fourth from right, and Donald Williams with drum second from right, with Director Raymond Harris holding conductor's baton on left, and James H. Williams wearing suit and overcoat on right, posed at attention in front of brick and stone building
credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Charles "Teenie" Harris
provenance_text: Pittsburgh Courier Photographic Archives, Pittsburgh, PA
